item.title: K8s中常用的gcr.io镜像
item.description: For don’t connect to gcr.io in china. Kubernetes Dashboard Docker Pull Command 1 docker pull siriuszg/kubernetes-dashboard-amd64:TAG Tags More tags at siriuszg/kubernetes-dashboard-amd64 Addon Resizer Docker Pull Command 1 docker pull siriuszg/addon-resizer:TAG Tags More tags at siriuszg/addon-resizer Pause Docker Pull Command 1 docker pull siriuszg/pause-amd64:TAG Tags 3.0 3.1 More tags at siriuszg/pause-amd64 Nginx Ingress Controller Docker Pull Command 1 docker pull siriuszg/nginx-ingress-controller:TAG Tags More tags at siriuszg/nginx-ingress-controller Kong Ingress Controller Docker Pull
